column1: I truly don’t understand what Trump’s motivation is, has he reached the lying to himself and believing it stage of the coronavirus pandemic? I understand the type of people that vote for him authoritarian personality’s social dominance, prejudiced, this willing to die thing ???
Wilbur Ross on Fox said coronavirus will be good for 'American jobs,' "I think it will help to accelerate the return of jobs to North America," bunch of ghouls.
